definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[רעה]] (Aram. [[רְעָא]], r9e0, take pleasure (in), desire, = Ar. rd.y [Heb. [[רָחָה]]], whence Aram. [[רְעוּתָא]] desire, [[רַעֲיׇנׇא]], [[רַעֲיוֹנׇא]], re9yono0, opinion, thought, disposition, and following late and Aram. words in Heb., cf. Nö:ZMG liv (1900), 155; > De Siegf:Ec 18 al. from I. [[רעה]]

definitions.title: 2 b,
definitions.body: cf. Ho 12:2, and Ar. ra9ay; watch, regard, respect (Lane) [Ba:WU 46 f. Kau:Armaismen 82 f. derive foll. from I. [[רעה]] = observe, attend to, specif. tend sheep, also aim at, purpose]).
